flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: COMBUSKEN toughens up its legs andnthighs by running through fields andnmountains.fThis POKéMON’s legs possess both speednand power, enabling it to dole out tennkicks in one second.
COMBUSKEN battles with the intenselynhot flames it spews from its beak andnwith outstandingly destructive kicks.fThis POKéMON’s cry is very loud andndistracting.
It lashes out with 10 kicks per second.nIts strong fighting instinct compels itnto keep up its offensive until thenopponent gives up.
It boosts its concentration by emittingnharsh cries. Its kicks have outstandingndestructive power.
It boosts its concentration by emittingnharsh cries. Its kicks have outstandingndestructive power.
Its kicking mastery lets it loosen10 kicks per second. It emitsnsharp cries to intimidate foes.

Ce maître du coup de pied peut donnern10 coups par seconde. Ses cris aigusnintimident l’ennemi.
Its kicking mastery lets it loosen10 kicks per second. It emitsnsharp cries to intimidate foes.
Ce maître du coup de pied peut donnern10 coups par seconde. Ses cris aigusnintimident l’ennemi.

Its kicking mastery lets it loosen10 kicks per second. It emitsnsharp cries to intimidate foes.
１びょうかんに　キックを　１０ぱつnくりだす　あしわざの　もちぬし。nするどい　なきごえで　いかくする。
1초에 킥을 10번 날릴 정도로n발을 사용하는 기술에 능하다.n날카로운 울음소리로 위협한다.
Ce maître du coup de pied peut donner 10 coupsnpar seconde. Ses cris aigus intimident l’ennemi.
Es kann zehn Tritte pro Sekunde austeilen.nEs gibt schrille Schreie von sich, um Gegnerneinzuschüchtern.
Su habilidad le permite dar diez patadas por segundo.nLanza potentes gritos para intimidar.
Possiede l’abilità di sferrare anche dieci calci alnsecondo. Emette urla strazianti per intimorire i nemici.
Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks pernsecond. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.
１秒間に　キックを　１０発n繰り出す　足技の　持ち主。n鋭い　鳴き声で　威嚇する。
たたかいに　なると　たいないのnほのおが　はげしく　もえあがる。nキックは　はかいりょく　ばつぐんだ。
싸우게 되면 체내의n불꽃이 세차게 타오른다.n킥은 파괴력이 굉장하다.
Au combat, les flammes dans son corps redoublentnd’intensité. Ses coups de pied sont dévastateurs.
Im Kampf lodert sein inneres Feuer hoch auf. Wo seinenmächtigen Tritte landen, wächst kein Gras mehr.
Al pelear, el fuego de su interior se intensifica. Esncapaz de propinar unas patadas demoledoras.
Quando lotta, il suo fuoco interiore diventanincandescente. Sferra calci di notevole potenzandistruttiva.
During a battle, the hot flame in its body increases.nIts kicks have outstanding destructive power.
戦いに　なると　体内の　炎がn激しく　燃え上がる。nキックは　破壊力　抜群だ。
のやまを　はしりまわって　あしこしを　きたえる。nスピードと　パワーを　かねそなえた　あしはn１びょうかんに　１０ぱつの　キックを　くりだす。
산과 들을 뛰어다니며 하반신을 단련한다.n스피드와 파워를 겸비한 다리는n1초에 10번 킥을 날린다.
Galifeu muscle ses cuisses et ses mollets en courant dans lesnchamps ou dans les montagnes. Les jambes de ce Pokémonnsont très puissantes et rapides, capables de donner 10 coupsnde pied en 1 seconde.
Jungglut trainiert seine Beine und Oberschenkel, indem es übernFelder und Berge läuft. Die Beine dieses Pokémon sind sowohlnschnell als auch kräftig, sodass es 10 Tritte pro Sekundenausführen kann.
Combusken fortalece las piernas corriendo por llanos ynmontañas. Este Pokémon tiene en las extremidades inferioresntanto fuerza como velocidad. Puede dar hasta diez patadasnpor segundo.
Combusken si allena correndo in campagna e in montagna.nLe zampe inferiori sono rapide e potenti e riescono a sferrarendieci calci al secondo.
Combusken toughens up its legs and thighs by runningnthrough fields and mountains. This Pokémon’s legs possessnboth speed and power, enabling it to dole out 10 kicks innone second.
野山を　走り回って　足腰を　鍛える。nスピードと　パワーを　兼ね備えた　足はn１秒間に　１０発の　キックを　繰り出す。
クチバシから　はきだす　しゃくねつの　ほのおとnはかいりょく　ばつぐんの　キックで　たたかう。nなきごえが　おおきいので　とても　やかましい。
부리에서 토해 내는 작열하는 불꽃과n뛰어난 파괴력의 킥으로 싸운다.n울음소리가 커서 무척 시끄럽다.
Galifeu combat grâce aux flammes ardentes qu’il crachende son bec et à ses coups de pied destructeurs.nLe cri de ce Pokémon est très puissant et très gênantnpour l’adversaire.
Jungglut stößt im Kampf glühend heiße Flammen aus seinemnSchnabel aus und setzt extrem vernichtende Tritte ein.nDas Geschrei dieses Pokémon ist sehr laut und verwirrend.
Combusken lucha haciendo uso de las abrasadoras llamasnque expulsa por el pico y de unas patadas fulminantes.nEste Pokémon emite un sonido muy fuerte y molesto.
Combusken combatte sputando fiamme roventi dal beccone sferrando calci dall’enorme potenza distruttiva.nIl verso di questo Pokémon è lacerante e distrae gli avversari.
Combusken battles with the intensely hot flames it spews fromnits beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. ThisnPokémon’s cry is very loud and distracting.
クチバシから　吐きだす　灼熱の　炎とn破壊力　抜群の　キックで　戦う。n鳴き声が　大きいので　とても　やかましい。
